body:
### Hi!
Scalapenos is a collection of open source Scala projects by @agemooij.

### The Projects
- [riak-scala-client](https://github.com/agemooij/riak-scala-client) - A non-blocking Scala client library for the [Riak](http://basho.com/products/riak-overview/) key/value store
- [rhinos](https://github.com/agemooij/rhinos) - A simple Scala wrapper around the Rhino Javascript runtime. This project is no longer actively maintained (unless by popular demand)
name: Scalapenos
